column2: Where Villains scheme, train, hoard, and sleep. A home away from home.
Where Heroes meet, train, plan, and sleep. A home away from home.
An impressive tower that houses those who dabble in the arcane.
An impressive tower that houses those who claim mastery over the arcane.
An investment by the ruler, an inn of grand scale to provide improved comforts for travelers and entertainment.
A simple shrine dedicated to Lilith.
A group of huts where captured slaves are trained and sold.
Where people gather to watch and cheer those testing their mettle.
A specialist in areas that most don't understand. Respected and feared.
A slave focused trading port. Doesn't provide training, only trade.
Conquered slaves are centrally trained and transported, improving their usefulness.
A modified dungeon that allows for collecting and training slaves.
A place of entertainment, where one can go for companionship.
Smaller than a Coliseum and more likely to hold combat events than games.
A place of worship to Lilith, hidden where only the faithful may find it.
An inn with staff who have a very specific set of skills.
An extension of a city market where humans are the commodity.
A collection of buildings specializing in adult entertainment.
A large place where people gather to witness games or gladiatorial combat.
A collection of rarities from around the world for the discerning shopper.
A shop filled with a variety of herbal salves, powders, and potions.
A guild representing smiths, carpenters, and other skilled labor.
A wagon driven by a wise woman that specializes in various herbal remedies.
Filled with captured women and the occasional male, for meeting the needs of troops.
Captured and undesired women, along with the occasional male, provide morale boosting services.
A small shrine to Lilith that is secured in a chest during travels.
A room in your holding that is dedicated to Lilith, where the devout can worship.
A place of worship that is hidden outdoors in nature, where the faithful may visit
A trading hub for exotic goods, which also has a small store for as of yet unclaimed goods.
A corner of the town market has been renovated to secure and offer more exotic goods.
A villager who collects and is willing to sell exotic curiosities they've acquired.
